name: Di-Jumper
description:
Submission for the Programming for 3D Assignment

Jump between dimensions to collect all the discs to escape from the MONSTER.

Use the looking glass to peek into the previous dimension you were in.  

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact/ Pick Up

LMB: Drop Item

RMB: Throw Item

Q: Toggle Looking Glass

Alt+F4: To Quit
